name: Package Control Dark and Pink
description:
Makes the packagecontrol.io website dark themed and more lively and the default dull blue-grey shades.
Themed text, links, buttons, analytics, code, keyboard shortcuts etc....
additional_info:
It's a very simple theme (not many changes css wise)
Themed text, links, buttons, analytics, code, keyboard shortcuts etc....

Update: Added new selection colors and hover backgrounds
